      • byConversation

        public static void byConversation(User user,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Message>> conversations)
        Displays a list of conversations A conversation comprises a time-ordered list of messages Thus a list of conversations is a list of list of messages
        Parameters:
        user - simulates the logged-in user with whom various other users converse
        conversations - the list of list of messages, that is, the list of conversations
